entry.title: New release for Operational: v0.1.7
entry.content:
This release makes test mode a whole lot more usable + cleans up docker files.

  • Added env vars for SMTP based emails inside docker image.
  • Replaced avatars with Dicebear. Also fixed minor storage based bugs with avatar upload.
  • Make test events toggle more prominent. Now test mode's state is retained even if window is refreshed.

  • Minor UI edits all around.

  • From now on, all docker files are inside /docker. Docker image 0.1.7 has been tested and works, docker-compose might need modification to run on your environment.

  • Removed docker-compose-coolify.yml, Coolify is a broken platform unfortunately. I recommend using the docker image for Coolify instead.

entry.title: New release for Operational: v0.1.8
entry.content: This release fixes a nasty bug that would crash the server at a specific time every day because of a mismatch between Event and Events within the code for removing old and test events.

entry.title: New release for Operational: v0.2.0
entry.content:
This releases fixes a ton of obscure bugs including one where if you pass a event with string contents and you haven't defined a type, the event won't be expandable.

  • Fixed events not being expandable if type isn't defined(type is string by default if not specified)
  • Fixed some console.log errors in the frontend
  • Fixed minor session and push registration bugs
  • Fixed a push subscription bug where after login, push notifications won't work(you'll need to refresh the page to make it work, making it a PITA on PWA to setup notifications)
  • Increased session timeout to 30 days by default(previously, session expiry wasn't honored at all)
  • Enhanced playground's UI and added PHP code examples, added notify and test toggles, and minor UI edits.

entry.title: New release for Operational: v0.2.3
entry.content:
This minor release fixes some pesky bugs.

  • Fixed api url not being set correctly inside the Playground for self-hosters.
  • Increased content limit for Events to 6000. This should be enough to accommodate stripe webhook data.
  • Added better error handling for content limit.
  • Added PHP SDK inside Playground.
